M

move(Square, Square) - Method in class Chevron
 
move(Square, Square) - Method in class Piece
Checks if the selected piece can move to another square specified by the player
move(Square, Square) - Method in class Plus
Plus movement for 1 step : Move foward : (end.getY() == start.getY() + 1) , (end.getX() == start.getX()) Move backward :(end.getY() == start.getY() - 1) , (end.getX() == start.getX()) Move to the left : (end.getX() == start.getX() + 1) , (end.getY() == start.getY()) Move to the right : (end.getX() == start.getX() - 1) , (end.getY() == start.getY())
move(Square, Square) - Method in class Sun
Sun piece moves only one step in any direction.

Plus - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Plus(char) - Constructor for class Plus
Plus piece can move anywhere from 1 to 7 squares in any direction (forward,backward,left or right) until it reaches the end of board or blocked by another piece.
